headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Hotring Circuit
content: A fast car, a straightforward oval track, a clear day. What could be simpler? Well, you’d be surprised how complicated things can get when you throw thirty fossil fuel junkies and their man-eating stock cars into the mix – which is exactly what you can expect in Hotring, the latest race mode in GTA Online. Don’t bother checking your mirror. It will only upset you.
